Class StreamRadio

public class StreamRadio
extends java.lang.Object

StreamRadio class handles the data stream through the Radio Stream Connection

Constructor Detail

StreamRadio

public StreamRadio(java.lang.String ieeeAddress,
                   int portNum)
Default constructor. Starts a RadioStreamConnection between this SPOT and the one pointed to by the ieeeAddress

Parameters:
ieeeAddress - String address of the SPOT to stream to
portNum - int representing the port to connect on

java.lang.Exception
